FuncDef: This command sets the local system time.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the local date and time accurate to the minute in the YYYY/MM/DD format. Values-YYYY is the four-digit year
MM is the two-digit month
DD is the two-digit date.

Specifies the time (accurate to the second) in the hh:mm[:ss] format. If no seconds value is entered, the seconds are reset to :00. Values-hh is the two-digit hour in 24 hour format (00=midnight, 12=noon)
mm is the two-digit minute. ParamDefault: Default- 0
